mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( fil_amount, reg_date, status, type, user_id, wallet_id, message, hw_product_id ) VALUES ( #{fil_amount}, NOW(), #{status}, #{type}, #{user_id}, #{wallet_id}, #{message}, #{hw_product_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT user.user_name, user.user_email, transaction.transaction_id, transaction.status, transaction.reg_date, transaction.fil_amount, transaction.message, wallet.sp_address, transaction.hw_product_id FROM nanodc.transaction AS transaction INNER JOIN nanodc.wallet AS wallet ON transaction.wallet_id = wallet.wallet_id INNER JOIN nanodc.user_info AS user ON transaction.user_id = user.user_id WHERE user.user_status = 'active' ORDER BY transaction.reg_date DESC;

SELECT transaction.transaction_id, transaction.fil_amount, transaction.user_id, transaction.status, transaction.wallet_id, transaction.type, transaction.reg_date, transaction.message,transaction.hw_product_id,wallet.sp_address FROM transaction transaction inner join wallet wallet on wallet.wallet_id = transaction.wallet_id WHERE transaction.user_id =#{user_id}
